sen.j: 大岩街道を挟んで隣接する稲荷山や大岩山を含めた地域では、以前より産業廃棄物の不法投棄や野焼きなどが行われ、住環境への悪影響が問題になっていたが、京都市が1996年より立入調査や違法行為に対しての指導などを行った結果、野焼きなど環境汚染をおよぼす行為はほぼ無くなった。
sen.e: In an area including Mt. Inari and Mt. Oiwa adjacent to each other with Oiwa-kaido road therebetween, illegal damping of industrial wastes and burning off of the fields had been conducted since long ago and their adverse effects on the living environment had been problematic and, therefore, the Kyoto Municipal Government started visiting inspections and providing instructions, etc., against illegal actions in 1996 and, as a result, actions resulting in environmental pollutions such as burning off of fields have substantially been eliminated.

An area which consists of the Oiwa-kaido road in between Mt. Inari and Mt.
